quotes.quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: Learning without thought is labor lost; thought without learning is perilous.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: That is what learning is. You suddenly understand something you've understood all your life, but in a new way.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: Only the curious will learn and only the resolute overcome the obstacles to learning. The quest quotient has always excited me more than the intelligence quotient.
quotes.author: Eugene S. Wilson

quotes.quote:
Whoso neglects learning in his youth,
Loses the past and is dead for the future.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Whoever ceases to be a student has never been a student.
quotes.author: George Iles

quotes.quote: The wisest mind has something yet to learn.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Much learning does not teach understanding.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Never seem more learned than the people you are with. Wear your learning like a pocket watch and keep it hidden. Do not pull it out to count the hours, but give the time when you are asked.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: We learn by example and by direct experience because there are real limits to the adequacy of verbal instruction.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: What is important is to keep learning, to enjoy challenge, and to tolerate ambiguity. In the end there are no certain answers.
quotes.author: Martina Horner

quotes.quote: Whenever you are asked if you can do a job, tell 'em, 'Certainly I can!' Then get busy and find out how to do it.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Learning is not compulsory... neither is survival.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: You learn more quickly under the guidance of experienced teachers. You waste a lot of time going down blind alleys if you have no one to lead you.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham
